description: Smaller of a pair of consecutive lucky numbers with a gap of 2n.
comments: a(n) is the first occurrence of a difference of 2n between A000959(k+1) and A000959(k). - _Robert G. Wilson v_, May 12 2006a(136) > 10^9. - _Donovan Johnson_, Dec 07 2011
links: Donovan Johnson, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..135
mathematica: lst = Range[1, 10^6, 2]; i = 2; While[ i <= (len = Length@lst) && (k = lst[[i]]) <= len, lst = Drop[lst, {k, len, k}]; i++ ]; f[n_] := Block[{k = 1}, While[t[[k + 1]] - t[[k]] != 2n, k++ ]; t[[k]]]; Array[f, 41] (* _Robert G. Wilson v_ *)
author: _Patrick De Geest_
extensions: More terms from _Robert G. Wilson v_, May 12 2006
